DOC.brief_title: Vaccine Therapy Prostate Cancer Patients With Recombinant Soluble Prostate-Specific Membrane Antigen ( Rs-PSMA ) Plus Immunological Adjuvant Alhydrogel

Patients must adequate organ function define : WBC > = 3000/mm3 , neutrophil > = to1000/mm3 , platelet count > = l00,000 mm3 Bilirubin < 2.0 mg/dl Alkaline Phosphatase SGOT < 3.0 time upper limit normal Creatinine < = 2.0 mg/dl Hemoglobin > 9.0 g/dl ALT < 2.5 time upper limit normal Patients must least 18 year age Expected survival must > 6 month Patients must sign informed consent .
